form.anonymous: Responses to this form are anonymous - server members cannot see who you are.

integration.additionalpublic: Advanced settings, esp. for public integrations
integration.title: Integrations of

leaderboard.missingguild: You have to add the server!
leaderboard.title: Level leaderboard of

autoupdate.description: On the left you can see auto updating messages, featuring a custom leaderboard, fictive birthdays and a list of AFK members. You could also list the next servers events or just general statistics!
autoupdate.title: Auto updating messages

components.description: Using integrations you can do that and much more, like executing an action when a user violates an AutoMod rule!
components.title: Ever wanted to create custom buttons or selects?

moderation.description: Useful moderation commands and modlogs combined with Discord's native automod!
moderation.title: Advanced moderation features

rr.description: Create an unlimited amount of classical reaction roles, or use the modern button and select roles to let your members select roles!
rr.title: Reaction, button and select roles

stats.description: In the Docs you can find tips on how to setup stats. You can also track member and boost count as well as the messages sent per day and the active chatters - with no expiration!
stats.title: Serverstats in channel and category names and on the website

template.description: Using template you can load Discord templates onto existing servers. backup allows you to remove other bots like Xenon, as TomatenKuchen has way more features and backups almost everything which Discord allows the bot to :D
template.title: Load Discord templates and create feature-rich server backups

ticket.description: Multiple ticket categories, ticket embeds and Discord-like transcripts
ticket.title: Fully customizable ticket system

main.headline: TomatenKuchen is your All-in-One Discord bot for your Discord server!

privacy.deleteowndata: You can delete a fraction of your data yourself:
